page.title: 04 A MAYORAL VIEW-MRS.RILEY.
page.content: Mrs Riley moved to Shiremoor when she got married and at that time the house where she lives now was surrounded by fields and fields.Now her only relative left in the area is a nephew but Mrs Riley would not like to leave the area she has served for many years. Mrs Riley likes Shiremoor and has been a governor of our middle school since 1954.She likes the people and she would not like to see the area changed too much but she would like to see better shopping facilities and especially a new sports complex for the young people of the area.We now have three nurseries and one toddler group plus three areas of sheltered housing for the elderly.Mrs Riley was mayoress from 1977-79 and again in 1984-5,her year ended on 9th of May.
